body: This seem promising. Not ntr yet but i have a feeling it might have one chapter of it.
im getting a feeling is this a complete voyeurism series
I've seen the untranslated one and this Eng translation isn't complete
@hongduc9 if there is no ntr then isnt it just exhibitionism?

https://nhentai.net/g/199457/ <--- full story
Still dont understand wtf is this story. It's not ntr. He fucked the crush and watched a bunch of girl get fucked which he didnt care for anyway. Then what the hell is this story about ? Voyeurism ? Then what does the virgin note is for ????
Is this a netorare setup, there the MC gets to see one girl after another deflowered by the teacher (via the list)?

this is confusing, what does he gains with a list that tell hin who is a virgin or not? unless it tells him the time and place where they loose their virginity i see no use to that besides knowing that the girl he thinks is cute has already fucked a guy.

At this point I honestly don't understand why stuff like this is happening, with the MC legitimately seeing a teacher having sex with a minor who is a student, and there likely being no repercussions for the teacher (who, legally, should probably end up in jail, and definitely be fired) and the MC gets nothing out of it
hope the MC actually gets some stuff in the upcoming issues
